channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump fires commissioner of labor statistics after weaker-than-expected jobs figures slam markets
item.description: Trump accused BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer of being a political appointee who was manipulating jobs data.

item.title: Trump tariffs inject more uncertainty into global economy
item.description: Trump's extensive new tariff regime on dozens of U.S. partners are launching new trade wars and sending shock waves through markets.

item.title: Another late-night Trump trade twist — just hours before the world hit go
item.description: Trump’s late-night tariff moves have become a hallmark, catching markets off guard, reshaping deals, and forcing countries to react in real time.

item.title: Trump says he plans to fire BLS chief after poor U.S. jobs report
Stocks close week lower as Trump's tariffs and a weak jobs report rattle market
Where is Trump’s tariff money going? Here’s how much has come in.
Trump 'soft, weak and afraid' in firing labor statistics chief McEntarfer: Wyden
item.description: Trump accused Erika McEntarfer of falsifying jobs report numbers before the 2024 election to boost Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris' chan...

item.title: DOGE's fingerprints are on July job weakness, economist says
Amazon’s stock is falling, as this trend from earnings has investors worried
Jeffrey Epstein victims and family blast Trump for Ghislaine Maxwell prison transfer
item.description: President Donald Trump and the Justice Department face criticism for not releasing information about the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
